@usedefault

{{Account id:$$id}}

h2. Account: ${name}

{{actions:
- display: Disable
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/disable
  data:
   accountname: ${name}
  input:
  - reason

- display: Enable
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/enable
  data:
   accountname: ${name}
  input:
  - reason

- display: Delete
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/delete
  data:
   accountname: ${name}
  input:
  - reason

- display: Add User
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/addUser
  data:
   accountname: ${name}
  input:
  - username
  - accesstype

- display: Delete User
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/deleteUser
  data:
   accountname: ${name}
  input:
  - username

- display: Create Space
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/cloudspace/create
  data:
   accountname: ${name}
  input:
  - name
  - location
  - access
  - maxMemoryCapacity
  - maxDiskCapacity

- display: Change Credit
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/finance/changeCredit
  data:
   accountname: ${name}
  input:
  - amount
  - message

- display: Rename
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/rename
  data:
   accountname: ${name}
  input:
  - name
}}

h3. Details
|*Account ID*|$$id|
|*Real Name*|${displayname}|
|*Location*|${DCLocation}|
|*Company*|${company}|
|*Company Site*|${companyurl}|
|*Status*|${status}|

h3. Users Access
||User Name||E-Mail||ACL||
{% for user in users -%}
    |${user.id}|${user.emails}|${user.acl}|
{% endfor %}

h3. Spaces
{{cbspaces: accountId:$$id}}

h4. Transactions
{{transactions: accountId:$$id}}

h4. Balance
{{balances: accountId:$$id}}
